The Center will draw on the unmatched strengths of the NYU Law faculty in the fields of procedure and complex litigation, as well as on a Board of Advisors consisting of leading practitioners and Judges, to identify the problems that most deserve further investigation and engagement, and to fill a void in scholarly and policy analysis.   Upcoming Event: March 30, 2015, 6:30-8:30 p.m.   The Center on Civil Justice and the Alliance for Justice will host a reception and panel discussion of the short documentary, "Lost in the Fine Print" at the Torch Club at NYU, 18 Waverly Place.   Speakers Include:   Arthur R. Miller , University Professor, NYU School of Law   Nan Aron, President, Alliance for Justice   Florencia Marotta-Wurgler ’01, Professor of Law NYU School of Law   Geoffrey Parsons Miller , Stuyvesant P. Zimroth , Director, Center on Civil Justice at NYU School of Law and Senior Counsel, Arnold & Porter   Seating is limited. For more information and to register, click here.
